name: Yarnful Day
description:
Hi!

Here's our entry for Cozy Autumn Game Jam 2022. 
The game is about a grandma, who is knitting warm clothes for grand kids before winter. You should have 90% or more of accuracy to continue. If you miss a rhythm, you will knit incorrectly.

We really hope you like it. We are going to continue working on this game and improving stuff that wasn't implemented as good as we wanted to with new features and design assets. 

Have a cozy autumn!
